name: Ext_R4_ServiceRequest_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ServiceRequest.code for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: A code that identifies a particular service (i.e., procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations) that have been requested.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.code` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.code`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.code` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.code`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.code` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.code`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: A code that identifies a particular service (i.e., procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations) that have been requested.

Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.code` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.code`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes for tests or services that can be carried out by a designated individual, organization or healthcare service.  For laboratory, LOINC is  (preferred)[http://build.fhir.org/terminologies.html#preferred] and a valueset using LOINC Order codes is available [here](valueset-diagnostic-requests.html).
